_sText:
This is the spiritual successor to surf_neoteric, my first decent surf map.

T6, 5 stages, 3 bonuses.

B1 - a flybhop bonus by me
B2 - a +use booster minigame bonus by masog
B3 - a comfy calm down bonus by Spy Complex


Big thanks to Juxtapo for helping me through the entire process, Spy for consistently giving feedback, as well as merky and tele for testing.
Love you all <3


Theme:
To anyone curious, the theme (and name solace, which is defined as "comfort or consolation in a time of great distress or sadness") is based around the act of seeking escape in the virtual world and its artificiality while the world outside is steadily going downhill.
